name: Golden Retriever
about: Golden Retrievers are known for their gentle temperament and loyalty. They're great with kids and thrive in active families.

name: Poodle
about: Poodles are highly intelligent, making them easy to train. They come in multiple sizes and are great for people with allergies.

name: Labrador Retriever
about: Labradors are playful and eager to please. They make excellent companions for active households and love water.

name: Shih Tzu
about: Shih Tzus are affectionate lap dogs that enjoy short walks and lots of indoor time. They’re perfect for apartment living.

name: Siberian Husky
about: Siberian Huskies are strikingly beautiful and full of energy. They need plenty of exercise and a secure yard to thrive.

name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
about: Cavalier King Charles Spaniels are gentle, affectionate, and get along with everyone. They’re ideal for seniors or families.

name: Border Collie
about: Border Collies are extremely smart and driven. They excel in agility and herding, and they need daily mental stimulation.

shelters.name: Northern California Border Collie Rescue & Adoptions

name: Basset Hound
about: Basset Hounds are laid-back scent hounds with a love for lounging and short walks. They’re great with kids and other pets.

name: Australian Shepherd
about: Australian Shepherds are energetic and agile. They love to work and need plenty of exercise and a job to stay happy.

name: Chihuahua
about: Chihuahuas are tiny but confident dogs. They form strong bonds with their people and are well-suited for city life.

shelters.name: Chihuahua Rescue of San Diego County
